name: Nebula Warrior
description:
INTRODUCTION:

Simple space shooter game made with Unity.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • WASD KEYS to MOVE
  • SPACE / LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to SHOOT
  • Destroying enemies will give you score points.
  • Collect Health Boosts to avoid death.
CREDITS:
  • MAIN MENU MUSIC - SketchyLogic
  • GAME MUSIC - Matthew Pablo - http://www.matthewpablo.com
  • GAME OVER MUSIC - Fato Shadow
